**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 219 1.1 The creature gains the [primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134) trait and can cast a single innate spell from the [primal spell list](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4) once per day. Use the creature's level (see the table below) to determine the spell's level. Use the spell DC and spell attack roll on the table if the creature does not already have those statistics. ##
**Creature Level****Spell Level (Statistics)****Suggested Spells**
–1 to 2Cantrip (DC 15, attack +7)[_Electric arc_](/Spells.aspx?ID=97), [_produce flame_](/Spells.aspx?ID=236)
3 to 41st (DC 18, attack +10)[_Heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [_jump_](/Spells.aspx?ID=167), [_magic fang_](/Spells.aspx?ID=179), [_pass without trace_](/Spells.aspx?ID=215)
5 to 62nd (DC 21, attack +13)[_Barkskin_](/Spells.aspx?ID=20), [_enlarge_](/Spells.aspx?ID=102), [_resist energy_](/Spells.aspx?ID=256), [_shatter_](/Spells.aspx?ID=279)
7 to 83rd (DC 23, attack +15)[_Blindness_](/Spells.aspx?ID=26), [_slow_](/Spells.aspx?ID=289), [_stinking cloud_](/Spells.aspx?ID=309)
9 to 104th (DC 26, attack +18)[_Air walk_](/Spells.aspx?ID=6), [_freedom of movement_](/Spells.aspx?ID=128), [_solid fog_](/Spells.aspx?ID=290)
11 to 125th (DC 29, attack +21)[_Cloudkill_](/Spells.aspx?ID=42), [_elemental form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=98), [_wall of ice_](/Spells.aspx?ID=364)
13 to 146th (DC 31, attack +23)[_Baleful polymorph_](/Spells.aspx?ID=17), [_field of life_](/Spells.aspx?ID=114), [_tangling creepers_](/Spells.aspx?ID=331)
15 to 167th (DC 34, attack +26)[_Eclipse burst_](/Spells.aspx?ID=96), [_regenerate_](/Spells.aspx?ID=248), [_sunburst_](/Spells.aspx?ID=326), [_volcanic eruption_](/Spells.aspx?ID=360)
17 to 188th (DC 35, attack +27)[_Earthquake_](/Spells.aspx?ID=95), [_horrid wilting_](/Spells.aspx?ID=152), [_punishing winds_](/Spells.aspx?ID=240)
19 to 209th (DC 38, attack +30)[_Nature's enmity_](/Spells.aspx?ID=205), [_storm of vengeance_](/Spells.aspx?ID=313)
